title: "Vietnam Orders Social Media Firms to Cut ‘Toxic’ Content Using AI"
excerpt: "HO CHI MINH CITY, VIETNAM - Vietnam’s demand that international social media firms use artificial intelligence to identify and remove \"toxic\" online content is part of an ever expanding and alarming campaign to pressure overseas platforms to suppress freedom of speech in the country, rights groups, experts and activists say."
